game_description: XIII century, Europe, royal market courtyard. You are a knight who joined the medieval tournament. Your task is "simple". Jump on your trusty steed, grab your lance & defeat the enemy. Take into consideration speed, accuracy, strength. Equipment is also important. The better gear the easier the task. Oh, and other knights - they want to win as much as you do. You beat them the king's greatest treasure is yours. And I didn't mean gold. JOUSTING VR FEATURES - Physics - experience Exciting fights based on true lance fighting physics. - Progression - Knightly tournaments in which only the best advance to the next stages. - Challenge mode - Smash hanging items. An exceptional aim helps you hit the target.
review_1: Really excited to see where this one goes, really unique concept
review_2: There's not much to do but to joust, and so there's not much to say except that it really nails what it sets out to do. I hugely enjoyed perfecting each level and getting the unlocks. For the right price, the full game will be a definite buy. I only have two suggestions/points of criticism: 1. The pause menu in-level should have a retry/restart button: exiting out back to the tent, picking up the knife, and putting it back in the same place is too many steps when you make a mistake and want to try again. 2. Mix up the background SFX in the levels, or remove/reduce the blacksmith hammering SFX. Every single level ended with that loud tingy hammering in my ear while looking at the rewards, and by the time I was done it was driving me crazy. Other than that, really looking forward to seeing where this goes! Jousting against people online sounds super fun!
review_3: The developer clearly understands both the physics of jousting and the feeling of a medieval tournament itself, because this is a really great demo that should lead to an excellent full game! You can see a gameplay video and review I made here: https://youtu.be/nnfo71SqDgI
